summary: The site has a missing meta description, which can negatively impact its visibility in search results. Addressing this issue will improve click-through rates and overall SEO performance.

top_issues.why_it_matters: Meta descriptions help search engines understand page content and influence user clicks.
top_issues.evidence: The homepage lacks a meta description.

recommended_actions.action: Add a meta description to the homepage
Review and optimize meta descriptions for other pages
Conduct a full SEO audit to identify additional issues
Monitor click-through rates after implementing changes
Educate the team on best practices for meta descriptions

quick_wins: Add a concise meta description to the homepage
Ensure all pages have unique meta descriptions
Use relevant keywords in meta descriptions
